main.*:
'''Joanne''' is an old friend of '''Rachel''''s from Long Island who visits Rachel in [[Central Perk]] with [[Kiki]] and and Leslie in ''[[The One With George Stephanopoulos]].'' They all confirm that the biggest gossip is still Rachel dumping [[Barry]] at the alter. This depresses Rachel,  coming the same day she got her first paycheck but from which FISA had taken a large deduction. 

She is played by [[Marianne Hagan]].

Note - she should not be confused with [[Joanna]], Rachel's boss at [[Bloomingdale's]] who appears later in the series.
